datasource.sql: insert into byg_kondemnering.uninhabitable( area, address, user_id, case_status, case_date, sagsid, last_modified, modified_by, note, completed ) values ( [number:if isdefined (area) then area else NULL endif], [string:if isdefined (address) then address else NULL endif], [string:if isdefined (userId) then userId else NULL endif], [string:if isdefined (caseStatus) then caseStatus else NULL endif], [timestamp:toTimestamp(caseDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')], [number:if isdefined (sagsId) then sagsId else NULL endif], CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, [string:getUsershortid(sessionid)], [string:if isdefined (note) then note else NULL endif], [boolean:completed='true'] );

update byg_kondemnering.uninhabitable set area = [number:if isdefined (area) then area else NULL endif], address = [string:if isdefined (address) then address else NULL endif], user_id = [string:if isdefined (userId) then userId else NULL endif], case_status = [string:if isdefined (caseStatus) then caseStatus else NULL endif], case_date = [timestamp:toTimestamp(caseDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')], sagsid = [number:if isdefined (sagsId) then sagsId else NULL endif], last_modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, modified_by = [string:getUsershortid(sessionid)], note = [string:if isdefined (note) then note else NULL endif], completed = [boolean:completed='true'] where id = [number: id];
